tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_performance_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    total_sales DECIMAL(10, 2),
    policy_status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyPerformance (
    policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_name VARCHAR(255),
    policy_type VARCHAR(50),
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_count INT
);
CREATE TABLE reports (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, report_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, report_date DATE NOT NULL, policy_id INT NOT NULL, customer_id INT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE policies (policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, policy_start_date DATE NOT NULL, policy_end_date DATE NOT NULL, policy_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, customer_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, customer_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE policy_data (
 policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_name VARCHAR(255),
 policy_type VARCHAR(50),
 customer_id UUID,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 premium_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_data (
 customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_name VARCHAR(255),
 email VARCHAR(255),
 phone_number VARCHAR(15),
 address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE policy_performance (
 policy_id UUID,
 customer_id UUID,
 claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
 claim_date DATE,
 satisfaction_rating INT,
 PRIMARY KEY (policy_id, customer_id)
);
